channel.title: Bacs - Untitled 26 (project 13) Intro, verses, and pre chorus re work
channel.description: Hey guys! Just wanna drop this demo here for recommendation. Verses and intro are not quite fit and i’m still working on building up the track. Any advice, or rework ill take it. Just leave a comment here or in the track. Thanks ![image|500x500](upload://ar0rWrXFcAHrOqkDNJkeTZLttti.jpeg) [Demo 26](https://soundcloud.com/bacs-molina17-183209610/demo-26)

item.title: Bacs - Untitled 26 (project 13) Intro, verses, and pre chorus re work
item.dc:creator: PietervanBoven
item.description:
I really like the atmosphere you created, especially with that guitar. You can do a lot more with the verses though, like putting parts of the main beat, for example the 808’s, a bit earlier so you have a better flow. It’s really sudden when the beat drops with a buildup without a lot of percussion.

Cool demo!

Read full topic
item.source: Bacs - Untitled 26 (project 13) Intro, verses, and pre chorus re work
